name: How I Learned To Love The Bugs *UPGRADED*
name_original: How I Learned To Love The Bugs *UPGRADED*
description:
How I Learned To Love The Bugs is an unusual top-down shooter, where you cannot move how you would expect. You can only change your position through the recoil of you guns.

Left-Click for the Machine Gun

Right-Click for the Rocket Launcher

Fight hordes of enemies and collect score. And when you have earned enough you will be greeted by a far more dangerous foe.

The faster you move the more score you earn.

This is an  improved version of the game. The original game was made for the Wowie 2.0 Game Jam.

You can check out the jam version right here
